original_text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:
korean_text: 베드로는 아랫뜰에 있더니 대제사장의 여종 하나가 와서

sentences.original_text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace
there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:
sentences.korean_translation: 대제사장의 여종 중 한 사람이 왔더라
